resources.string:
Curame is an Android application created by the Curame Team as a final year project at the University of The West Indies.
 
 This app demonstrates the use of Image Classification in the feild of Dermatology.
 
 The goal of this project was to provide insite on the potential future of the health care industry.
 
 Thank You.
 
 By:
 Aaron Boodoo
 Josiah Jones
 Tyrese Lake

Warning
 This application is meant for demonstration purposes only and was created as part of a project for the University of The West Indies (UWI).
 This application is no where near ready for practical use, it merely gives a prediction of what a skin disease might be based on a few illnesses.
 Please see a professional Dermatologist/Doctor for accurate advice.
